summary: Done by request. The mage satchel mesh (from Apprentice clothes) looking like it hangs from something (i.e. a wall hook) - two versions.
descriptionHtml:
I made this as it was requested on r/skyrimmods.

The archive includes two meshes. Both are edited versions of the satchel from the Mage Apprentice clothes, edited to look like they are hanging down from something.

One version has a roundly shaped strap (to be hung over a broader, round object), the other version has a pointed strap (to be hung on something like a wall hook). See images.

[b]This is a resource, not a playable/equipable object. [/b]

[b]The meshes will use whatever texture you have for the vanilla male Mage Apprentice clothes, unless you change the texture paths.

[/b]Feel free to use the meshes for whatever you want. Crediting me would be appreciated.
author: Cyphe

files.name: Hanging Mage Satchels Resource
files.changelogHtml:
- Root node type is now BSFadeNode instead of NiNode
- Tweaked the satchels' alignment (more centered now)
